ygData.subject: Re: JBoots...where o where can I find them :)
ygData.msgSnippet: I believe you mean the ancient cyclops.  At least thats what I recall him being called and I saw him a few times in OOT.  There is an island with a single
ygData.messageBody:
I believe you mean the ancient cyclops. At least thats what I recall
him being called and I saw him a few times in OOT. There is an island
with a single cyclops <not seafury> on it. The Ancient sometimes spawns
in his place.

Zoddie retired solro killer wizzie

Robert Jones wrote:
>
> From: Robert Jones <rjones@...>
>
> The quest involves killing an Undead Cyclops that can spawn in a few
> different zones, South Karana... S. Ro or N. Ro... another one i think too.
> I've spent many an hour killing aviaks with my Ranger character in South
> Karana and never have I seen this MOB (I've seen ALL the other named spawns
> in this zone but this one).
>
> I guess what I wanted to say was, I wouldn't even think about questing this
> item unless I got lucky and found the Undead Cyclops. Otherwise you'll be
> looking forever.
>
> But... I belive the NPC you need to talk to is in Rathe Mnts for the quest.
> Is there anyone here that's successfully camped the Undead Cyclops?
>
> Veron 21 wiz
> Exley 25 rng
> on Tunare
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Nat Russo [mailto:nrusso@...]
> Sent: Friday, January 21, 2000 12:47 PM
> To: Eq_Wizards@Onelist. Com
> Subject: [eq_wizards] JBoots...where o where can I find them :)
>
> From: "Nat Russo" <nrusso@...>
>
> I know that JBoots used to be dropped in Najena, but where have they gone?
> I heard they're a quest item, but I can't seem to find much information
> about them.
>
> Can someone please let me know the details?
>
> Thanks in advance,
> Olatan Ossur, 21st Wizard on Solusek Ro
